text: Bachelor is an unincorporated community in northern Callaway County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The community is on Missouri Route A, approximately six miles east-southeast of Auxvasse. The headwaters of Bachelor Creek are to the northwest of the community.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 2007, Third edition, p. 38, ==History== A post office called Bachelor was established in 1875, and remained in operation until 1959. The community was named after Bachelor Creek. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Callaway County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Bachelor, Missouri
